author: Mubasher Bukhari
title: Comunidade cristã paquistanesa é atacada após acusação de blasfêmia
text: Pelo menos dez membros de uma comunidade minoritária cristã foram resgatados neste sábado, depois que uma multidão muçulmana atacou o assentamento sob acusação de blasfêmia no leste do Paquistão, disseram a polícia e um líder comunitário. A multidão acusou o grupo de blasfêmia e atirou pedras e tijolos contra a polícia, disse Shariq Kamal, chefe da polícia do distrito de Sargodha. Pelo menos uma casa e uma pequena fábrica de calçados foram incendiadas pelos manifestantes, que se reuniram depois que vizinhos alegaram que o livro sagrado muçulmano, o Alcorão, havia sido profanado por um membro da comunidade, segundo um porta-voz da polícia e Akmal Bhatti, um líder cristão. "Eles queimaram uma casa e vários cristãos foram espancados", disse Bhatti. Um grande contingente de policiais isolou o assentamento, disse Kamal, acrescentando que a multidão foi rechaçada. Mais tarde, informaram que um membro da comunidade cristã que foi levado ao hospital estava em condição estável. A situação se acalmou tarde da noite, com líderes de ambos os lados pedindo paz, disse a polícia. Um grupo de direitos cristãos, o Minority Rights March, disse que um homem de 70 anos acusado de blasfêmia foi espancado e arrastado pela multidão. O grupo afirma que imagens de vídeo mostraram que a polícia não interveio. A polícia negou a alegação.

author: Brian Ponce
title: Remote controlled plane trapped on ice of Wilson Lake in Wilton
text:
WILTON — As a parent, a lot of hard work goes into getting your children’s gifts ready for the holidays.
Amazon carts are filled and emptied, stockings are stuffed, credit cards are abused and a lot of hours are spent in long lines, eventually leading to the picturesque moment when wrapping paper is ripped open and the gifts you’ve been anxiously waiting for them to see are finally revealed. All the hours of hard work make the moment so meaningful for a parent, it’s almost indescribable.
Finding out that said gift found its way into a tree or is sitting atop the ice cover of a lake fifty feet from shore awakens an entirely different set of feelings, which are perfectly describable.
Brianna Simeon found herself in that very position when her 12 year-old son Carter Simeon managed to get his brand new remote controlled airplane struck not once, but twice.
The first occurrence happened on Monday, Dec. 25. The plane was a gift to Carter from his grandmother. Currently on break from Mt. Blue Middle School, Carter has a big interest in planes and aviation, with his recent focus being on World War II model airplanes.
With his new gift in hand, Carter took to the skies and let his plane fly at Kineowatha Park, but the plane soon found itself stuck in one of the trees by the entrance way.
With the help of Wilton Fire and Rescue, as well as the Wilton Police Department, Carter had his plane back in his hands and was ready to fly once again.
His flight would be delayed, however, when on Tuesday, Dec. 26, his plane landed on the ice cover of Wilson Lake roughly 50 feet from the shoreline. With half of the lake starting to freeze over, the ice foundation on top of Wilson Lake bought the boy and his parents some time to find ways to snag it.
The Franklin Journal was nearby when Simeon and her son arrived with a roof rake stretching 25 ft. that barely made it halfway to its destination.
“I have been trying since about 11 in the morning,” she said.
With the roof rake unsuccessful, Simeon returned home to grab her kayak to see if she could break the ice and get to the plane that way. Unwilling to bother the fire department again, she was determined to rescue the plane by her own means.
The ice proved too thick, unfortunately, and after a valiant attempt to break her way through, Simeon was forced back to the shore. By then, her husband Luis Simeon had arrived to see what he could offer the situation. Searching through his truck, Luis pulled out a couple of fishing rods and tried to see if he could snag the plane from the shore.
After trying with two fishing poles came up short, it was time to pack it in and call it a day.
On Wednesday, Dec. 27, Brianna shared an update with The Franklin Journal, telling that the plane was still trapped atop the ice. The first attempt at dislodging it with a remote controlled car proved unsuccessful due to the ice being too slippery to get any traction.
After Hulu hoops with rope tied to them also yielded no results, Simeon said it was back to the drawing board. She hopes to find a way to rescue the plane before snow and rainfall could potentially bury, and eventually sink, the plane.
Simeon asked if any local residents are able to retrieve the plane, to please contact her at [702] 612-3680.

author: Jan
title: Jaiswal bags six to put Bengal on top
text:
Jaiswal bags six to put Bengal on top
Kolkata: Pacer
Suraj Sindhu Jaiswal picked up six for 46 to put Bengal on top at the end of Day I of their Ranji Trophy Elite Group ‘C' penultimate league match against Haryana at the Bengal Cricket Academy (BCA) ground in Kalyani on Thursday.
In a must-win match against table-toppers Haryana to keep their knockout hopes alive, Bengal's pace trio of Mukesh Kumar, Jaiswal and Mohammed Kaif ran through the visitors' first innings to bowl them out for a paltry 157 in 44.5 overs after the tea break. At stumps, the hosts were at 10 after losing opener Writtick Chatterjee, who was drafted in as a late replacement for the injured Abhimanyu Easwaran.
Haryana, however, began on a promising note with openers Lakshhya Dalal and Ankit Kumar putting together an 81-run opening-wicket stand after a delayed start due to fog and wet outfield. But the Bengal pacers vindicated their skipper Anushtup Majumder's decision to bowl first on a lively wicket by striking hard in the second session as from 69 no loss at lunch, Haryana tumbled to 122 for four at the tea interval. They lost the remaining six wickets in 14.5 overs.
Skipper Ankit set up the platform with a 56-ball 57, but sadly none of the Haryana batters could build on that as they lost wickets at regular frequencies. Jaiswal began his hunt by clean bowling Ankit and No. 3 batter Himanshu Rana. While Mukesh Kumar and Kaif picked up two wickets each in the middle overs, Jaiswal returned to wrap up the tail to end with six for 46.
It remains to be seen if the 15-year-old debutant Ankit Chatterjee, who played out 20 deliveries to remain undefeated on five with nightwatchman Rohit Kumar, will be able to carry forward his U-19 stage good show to the senior level and help Bengal earn full points from this match.
Brief scores: Haryana 157 in 44.5 ovs (Ankit Kumar 57; SS Jaiswal 6-46, Mukesh Kumar 2-52, Md Kaif 2-23). Bengal 10/1 in 5 ovs (Sumit Kumar 1-2).

author: DaiTakara
title: #8 El tuit que nadie se esperaba, la Falange Auténtica sale en defensa de Ana Peleteiro contra el racismo
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#6](c6#c-6) Es justo lo qué estaba pensando, qué cojones está pasando que la falange suena a derecha moderada
No es tan raro. Si eres hispanista no puedes ser racista, por mucho que alíes con los nazis por conveniencia anticomunista. Eso no lo entienden ni los cabezahueca locales. Si un falangista de la era escuchara a un neonazi de los que encima llevan aguilucho que hay que exterminar al 90% de hispanos mixtos del mundo por ideología (como argumentan los de la banda de Villacís), esa gente estaba en el paredón a la mínima.
Pero cuando eres un indigente mental que ignoras que hasta la voz euskalherria era carlista, que Navarra estaba dentro por razón natural (y la Vasconia francesa) y defendida por hispanistas como algo más puramente hispano que el chotis, pues solo queda reírnos de semejantes imbéciles.
"la raza es lo de menos" no cabrones, la raza es un invento de mentecatos como la pseudociencia nazi que hemos tenido que soportar que sobreviva a a la segunda guerra mundial, promoviendo todavía la incultura de que la mayoría de la gente no sepa algo tan básico como que nuestra raza es el homo sapiens sapiens y se acabó. Que no hay más, y los colorines son irrelevantes.
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raza_(clasificaci%C3%B3n_de_los_seres_humanos))
Y nostros los homo sapiens sapiens, la única raza humana que ya queda sobre la tierra, INCLUSO, nos hibridamos en el pasado con otras razas humanas ya desaparecidas, e incluso puede que colaborásemos ampliamente a extinguir algunas otras.
De lo que queda, somos todos lo mismo.
No puede ser que algo de educación tan básica sigua extendiéndose en pleno 2024.

author: Camilo Clavel
title: Qué trucos debes saber para poder limpiar tu mesa en estas fiestas
text:
Cuando se organiza una reunión en casa, ya sea para celebrar un cumpleaños, compartir una comida o festejar Navidad y Año Nuevo, es común [realizar una limpieza profunda](https://www.losandes.com.ar/por-las-redes/el-truco-casero-para-dejar-el-horno-impecable-y-que-no-se-ensucie-tan-rapido/) de todos los ambientes. Este esfuerzo busca que los invitados se sientan cómodos y el ambiente del hogar sea mucho más ameno.
Sin embargo, un detalle que suele pasar desapercibido son las manchas de vasos o líquidos en mesas de madera. Estas marcas, que pueden ser residuos de encuentros anteriores o accidentes cotidianos, [no siempre se eliminan fácilmente ](https://www.losandes.com.ar/por-las-redes/el-ingrediente-casero-para-que-en-las-fiestas-cuando-limpies-el-piso-dejes-un-aroma-muy-fresco/)con los productos de limpieza convencionales. Para resolver este problema de manera rápida y eficaz, existen seis métodos infalibles.
6 métodos para limpiar las manchas de tus mesas de madera
1. Planchar con una toalla seca: Extendé una toalla seca sobre la superficie limpia de la mesa. Luego, utilizá una plancha caliente y pasala suavemente sobre la toalla. Este procedimiento ayuda a eliminar las marcas de forma efectiva.
2. Bicarbonato de sodio; Creá una pasta mezclando una cucharada de bicarbonato con una taza de agua. Aplicala directamente sobre las manchas, frotá suavemente y dejá actuar por diez minutos. Retirá los restos con un trapo húmedo y limpio para restaurar el acabado.
3. Pasta de dientes blanca: Colocá una pequeña cantidad sobre la mancha y frotá con movimientos circulares utilizando una servilleta. Luego, limpiá la superficie con un paño limpio para dejarla impecable.
4. Esponja de acero y jugo de limón: Si las manchas persisten, frotá con cuidado en la dirección de la veta de la madera usando una esponja de acero inoxidable y unas gotas de jugo de limón. Este método debe aplicarse con precaución para proteger el acabado del mueble.
5. Secador de pelo: Configurá el secador en su máxima potencia de calor y dirigilo directamente a la mancha, moviéndolo uniformemente hasta que desaparezca. Es una solución sencilla y rápida.
6. Mayonesa: Aplicá una pequeña cantidad de mayonesa sobre la marca y dejala reposar durante varias horas. Después, limpiá la superficie para descubrir un mueble renovado y sin imperfecciones.

author: 文匯報
title: 美商會：港具獨特地位利地區合作 - 香港 - 香港文匯網
text:
擁有2,000名會員的香港美國商會在聲明中表示，香港一直是該商會大多數會員的地區商業中心，包括許多《財富》世界五百強企業。 一直以來，香港持續為美國及其他貿易夥伴維護自由港地位，不對進口產品徵收關稅，亦不實施關稅配額。2024年，美國對香港的商品貿易順差達219億美元，突顯雙方互利共贏、相互依存的經濟關係。美國與香港的貨物貿易總額估計為338億美元，為美國農業、時尚、製造業等多個領域提供了近14萬個就業機會。此外，美國在香港的地區總部、地區辦事處及地方分支機構，數量從2023年的1,273個增至2024年的1,390個，在香港僱用員工約77,000人。
香港文匯報訊 針對美國近期連串關稅政策，香港美國商會日前發聲明表示，香港的獨特地位及在全球貿易中的關鍵作用，對促進地區合作和經濟增長至關重要。
擁有2,000名會員的香港美國商會在聲明中表示，香港一直是該商會大多數會員的地區商業中心，包括許多《財富》世界五百強企業。 一直以來，香港持續為美國及其他貿易夥伴維護自由港地位，不對進口產品徵收關稅，亦不實施關稅配額。2024年，美國對香港的商品貿易順差達219億美元，突顯雙方互利共贏、相互依存的經濟關係。美國與香港的貨物貿易總額估計為338億美元，為美國農業、時尚、製造業等多個領域提供了近14萬個就業機會。此外，美國在香港的地區總部、地區辦事處及地方分支機構，數量從2023年的1,273個增至2024年的1,390個，在香港僱用員工約77,000人。
美商會認為，貿易夥伴在制定政策時應將香港單獨考慮，採取「細微差別方式」（nuanced approach）對待香港，以體現香港的獨特地位及在全球貿易中的關鍵作用。

author: Jenni Williams
title: Police identifies 19-year-old following Christmas Eve shooting
text: Asheville PD identifies 19-year-old following Christmas Eve shooting Officers found 16 shell casings nearby Asheville PD identifies 19-year-old following Christmas Eve shooting Officers found 16 shell casings nearby SNOW COMING OUR WAY. CHRIS. THANK YOU. AND NOW TO WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA, WHERE ASHEVILLE POLICE ARE INVESTIGATING A SHOOTING THAT HAPPENED ON CHRISTMAS EVE. OFFICERS SAY IT HAPPENED JUST BEFORE 9:30 P.M. NEAR DEPOT STREET WHEN THEY ARRIVED, THEY SAY THEY FOUND A 19 YEAR OLD MAN AT A GAS PUMP WITH MULTIPLE GUNSHOT WOUNDS TO THE UPPER BACK. THE VICTIM WAS TRANSPORTED TO MISSION HOSPITAL AND IS IN CRITICAL CONDITION. IF YOU H Advertisement Asheville PD identifies 19-year-old following Christmas Eve shooting Officers found 16 shell casings nearby The Asheville Police Department is investigating a shooting that left a man in critical condition on Christmas Eve.Officers said that they responded to a business near the 400 block of Depot Street around 9:20 p.m. on Sunday and found a 19-year-old man at a gas pump with multiple gunshot wounds to his back.Officers said that they found 16 shell casings in the area.If you have any information about this shooting, you are asked to contact the Asheville Police Department at 828-252-1110, or you can send an anonymous tip using the TIP2APD smartphone app or by texting TIP2APD to 847411. ASHEVILLE, N.C. — The Asheville Police Department is investigating a shooting that left a man in critical condition on Christmas Eve. Officers said that they responded to a business near the 400 block of Depot Street around 9:20 p.m. on Sunday and found a 19-year-old man at a gas pump with multiple gunshot wounds to his back. Advertisement Officers said that they found 16 shell casings in the area. If you have any information about this shooting, you are asked to contact the Asheville Police Department at 828-252-1110, or you can send an anonymous tip using the TIP2APD smartphone app or by texting TIP2APD to 847411.
